identity.name: Truth Spectrogram
identity.mission: Reveal the synthetic nature of AI voices through clinical precision and data visualization.
identity.aesthetics: Cybersecurity Dashboard meets Swiss Design. Dark mode default, high contrast, neon data accents.

motion.instructions: Use Framer Motion for all entry animations. The waveform should 'breathe' (scaleY) when analyzing. Results should 'count up' (0% to 99%).

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add Chivo, Manrope, and JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts in index.html or index.css.
DARK MODE ONLY: Force dark mode by adding 'dark' class to html/body or setting default theme to dark.
NO ROUNDED CORNERS: Minimize border-radius. Use rounded-sm or rounded-md max. Security tools are sharp.

WAVEFORM: Create a visual 'fake' waveform using CSS bars (multiple divs with different heights animating) if real data isn't available, or use the Recharts BarChart with random data to simulate audio analysis.
CONFIDENCE METER: Use a large, monospaced percentage display that counts up.
API KEY INPUT: Make it look like a password field with a 'Show' toggle, styled like a terminal input.
RESULT CARDS: Use color coding heavily. If Human: Cyan/Teal borders and glow. If AI: Orange/Red borders and glow.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
